ask.gecmis: Darling, do you remember that spark that started suddenly and passionately in your past, as if lightning had struck your love life? That new beginning, which caused your heart to beat wildly when you least expected it, gave you life energy. Perhaps that attraction that started with a single look set your whole world on fire at once and dragged you into an adventurous path. This fresh and burning energy you felt in that period allowed you to rediscover your passion for love. You literally were reborn back then with the inspiring power of love.
ask.simdi: Honey, a huge spark is igniting in your love life right now; you are witnessing the birth of a brand-new passion! If you are in a relationship, the fire between you is being rekindled and it's as if you are experiencing the excitement of the first day. If you are single, the person who will enter your life will affect you so much that you will want to run toward love with all your courage. This card heralds that you are in a period where sexual energy, excitement, and new beginnings peak. Listen to the voice of your heart and go where this fresh energy drags you.
ask.gelecek: In your future, there is a very fiery and inspiring beginning in the name of love that will radically change your life! You will meet someone such that you will feel that magnificent attraction between your soul and body to your very core. This relationship will not only be an emotional bond but also a connection that feeds you creatively and gives you strength. Perhaps a 'love at first sight' story awaits you and this time everything will progress much more boldly. Get ready darling, the most passionate and energetic page of your love life is about to open.

is.gecmis: In your past, a brand-new income gate was opened in financial terms and you made a start that would revitalize your financial situation. Perhaps thanks to an additional job or a creative investment idea, a fresh breath came to your wallet. The new opportunities money offered you must have excited and encouraged you a lot back then. Those smart and energetic steps you took in those days were the first seeds of your financial accumulations today. You discovered that fresh and dynamic way of earning money in the past, darling.
is.simdi: Honey, you are currently experiencing a complete creativity explosion in your business life; ideas are literally flying in the air! This fresh energy you hold says 'start something new' to you; whether it's a new job or a brand-new project. That ambition and desire to succeed within you are currently at their peak; you are ready to burn through every obstacle that comes your way. This period is the perfect time to showcase your leadership qualities and become the master of your own business. The universe supports you; just take that first step and release your creativity.
is.gelecek: In your future, a very big and exciting opportunity regarding your business life is about to knock on your door. This will be such an offer that it will provide a ground where you can speak through all your talents and make your name heard. Days are approaching where you will experience a leap in your career and shine with a new title or a new venture. That fire within you that refuses to go out will be your greatest strength to carry you to the very top of the success steps. Soon you will shine like a 'star' in business life, believe in this.

para.simdi: Honey, there is currently a new movement and profit opportunities in your financial matters; you are literally like a money magnet! You are starting to receive the financial return of a creative idea or a venture, and this motivates you a lot. This fresh energy in your wallet might be giving you courage to make new investments. You are in a period where you will discover new ways to accelerate the flow of money and feel much more financially free. Just trust your energy and don't forget to channel this abundance in the right direction.
para.gelecek: In your future, I see news of a gain that will relieve you a lot financially, starting from scratch but growing rapidly. A sum of money coming from an unexpected place or a very profitable partnership offer could change your life. You will literally sow a seed financially and see this seed turn into a huge tree of abundance. Instead of financial worries, exciting ideas on how to better evaluate money will come. Your future is full of very bright and productive beginnings for your wallet, darling.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a big energy explosion regarding your health and passed through a period where you felt as if you were reborn from your ashes. You might have started a new habit that increased your body's resistance or met with a branch of sports. This high life energy in that period strengthened you a lot both physically and mentally. That power of defense you gained against illnesses has been the greatest supporter of your resilient state today. You found the way to reach the peak of your physical power back then.
saglik.simdi: Honey, your body is literally bursting with energy right now; you feel very fit and ready to act! If you are experiencing any weakness, this card gives you the good news that you will recover immediately and a fresh life force is filling your body. You are at the best time for a new diet, a new sports program, or a detox because your will is like steel right now. This joy of life within you reflects on your appearance and makes you look glowing. Enjoy this high frequency, every cell is coming alive.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a brand-new life energy cycle is starting that will keep you very fit regarding health. A period awaits you where you will feel more powerful than ever and completely get rid of your chronic fatigues. Perhaps you will experience a miraculous healing process or meet a spiritual expert who will take your quality of life to the peak. Your body will get younger every passing day and your life energy will be high enough to inspire those around you. That fiery power you need for a healthy future will be with you, believe in this.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see an awakening and a brand-new beginning energy in every area of your life; as if everything started over. That first excitement in love, that first big success in work, and that fresh power in health touched your life at the same time and revitalized you. In every matter where you took a risk, the universe supported you and offered you that magnificent wand for you to progress. This momentum you gained back then has been the biggest driving force that put your life on its current creative track. You literally reshaped your fate in the past with fresh ideas and great curiosity, darling.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, right now a magnificent 'yes' energy prevails in every area of your life; literally everything is overflowing with a fresh excitement! Your heart is so glowing with love, your mind with business ideas, and your body with health that let anyone who can stop you try. It's the perfect time to bring out that brave hero within you to evaluate these new opportunities life offers you. Everything started with a spark and now that spark is about to turn into a giant torch that illuminates your entire world. Just believe and follow the light of that wand, honey.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future looks full of miraculous beginnings and great inspirations in every area of life! You will make literally a revolution in love, work, and every kind of personal development and build a brand-new 'you.' The fresh opportunities that will come your way will excite you so much that you will throw all the dust of the past aside and run toward the future with passion. In this new journey full of success, happiness, and health, the universe will be your biggest supporter and source of inspiration. Get ready darling, the most energetic and productive period of your life is starting for you very soon!

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, that flirtation or relationship that you started with great enthusiasm unfortunately didn't turn out as you expected and ended in disappointment. Perhaps you met someone immature who lied to you, or that important news of love you expected never came. This 'misleading beginning' in that period somewhat damaged your pure faith in love and made you defensive. Those days when you felt your emotions were exploited make it difficult for you to open your heart to someone new today. Just as you were catching the fresh scent of love, your dreams faded in those days, darling.
ask.simdi: Honey, you might be experiencing a period of 'communication breakdown' or 'bad news' in your love life right now; it's as if things are always misunderstood. That message you expect doesn't come, or you receive news from the person you love that disappoints you. Perhaps you are acting very childish and irresponsible right now, which might be putting your relationship in a deadlock. This card says you should not make hasty decisions right now and not believe everything told immediately. Your excitement might have left its place to pessimism; time to stop and calm down a bit.
ask.gelecek: In your future, in some situations you will experience regarding love, there is a risk of being misdirected by wrong people or being saddened by groundless news. That beginning you want so much might be postponed for a while longer due to the indecision or lies of the other party. The answer to the questions where you say 'I wonder?' in your relationships might not be as pink as you expect, so you should be cautious. However, this process will be a test given for you to be more selective and mature in love. If you want to establish a real bond in the future, you will need to learn not to think everything that glitters is gold, honey.

is.gecmis: In your past, you received a financial blow by either things going wrong at the last moment when you were expecting a big gain or by trusting a wrong news. Perhaps the lack of abundance of an investment tired you quite a bit back then, and the places where you said 'I will earn money from this business' let you down. You were so sure that the money would come that when the result was a disappointment, your financial balances must have been shaken a bit. This financial disappointment in those days causes you to approach money always with a suspicion today. You seem to have taken the financial wand a bit too lightly back then, darling.
is.simdi: Honey, you might feel yourself in a 'focus problem' in business life right now; you have a thousand ideas but you can't bring any of them to a conclusion. Perhaps you are dealing with groundless gossip at work or that promotion news you expected reached you negatively. Your motivation is so low that even evaluating the small opportunities that come your way feels like a big burden to you. This card whispers that you should maintain your seriousness right now and not change your strategy by believing every news you hear. You are in a chaos right now, you need to simplify your mind first.
is.gelecek: In your future, some bad news regarding your career plans or annoying situations like the cancellation of projects appear. If you are expecting an important job offer, you might learn that the conditions are much more difficult than you expected or that the offer has been withdrawn. While wanting to open a brand-new page in your career, you might encounter some obstacles or mistakes brought by inexperience. You shouldn't give up in this process but follow a more disciplined and realistic path. To catch that fresh energy leading to success again, you will need to be cleansed of childish mistakes.

para.simdi: Honey, there is a 'leak of abundance' in your wallet right now; it's as if it's clear where the money will go even before it reaches your hand, and this annoys you. You might be inclined to jump into groundless news or risky businesses that look very profitable in financial matters; please be careful! This period says the conditions are not suitable at all for making a financial start and the risk of being deceived is high. You are in a time frame where you need to act with your logic, not your emotions, to protect your money. You should master your expenses and protect your wallet from external influences.
para.gelecek: In your future, it appears that the big news of gain you expect regarding money will be a bit more delayed or not as big as you expected. Misinformation or a technical glitch regarding an investment or money transfer might annoy you. While expecting a financial relief, you have a risk of encountering extra expenses instead. The gate of wealth is not yet fully ajar, so you should progress cautiously and be very careful especially in the transactions you will make over the internet. To reach the energy of abundance, you must first take your financial responsibilities seriously.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you trivialized a health-related warning and caused a small problem to grow, darling. While your body was giving alarms, you got tired because you continued to force yourself with that childish energy saying 'nothing will happen.' Perhaps you started a treatment process but didn't take it seriously and left it halfway, so the healing process was very much delayed. This state of 'negligence' from that period triggers the fear of 'I wonder if it's something serious?' even at the slightest pain today. You silenced the voice of your body back then and didn't show it the necessary care.
saglik.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a complete 'energy chaos' regarding your health; sometimes you are very active and sometimes you are too exhausted to even move a finger. Your body is giving you some signals, but you either misinterpret them or ignore them completely. This card says your immunity is weak right now and you are more vulnerable especially to contagious diseases or accidents. Please put childish stubbornness aside, take your health seriously, and listen to your physical needs. Healing will come only when you take yourself seriously.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, you have a risk of experiencing some annoying processes like wrong diagnoses or delays in treatment regarding health issues. As long as you see taking care of yourself as a 'boring' task, it will be that much more difficult for you to reach full vitality. The physical fatigues you will encounter in the future will be a result of your current irregular lifestyle. If you don't follow a more serious and disciplined path to protect your health in the future, your body will stop you one day by force. You should increase your compassion and seriousness toward yourself and seek healing within your inner peace.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a period of general 'indecision' and 'wasted energies'; life has dragged you into wrong paths many times. The bad news that came just as you were about to jump with excitement into love, work, and financial matters or your own inexperience has worn you out quite a bit. Those days when you acted on the words of others or took childish risks have left some deficiencies in your life today. While you were trying to hold your wand upright against life, you extinguished the light of the wand in the wrong places, darling. This 'loss of direction' back then has made you more pessimistic today.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, right now you are in a phase of 'chaos' and 'waiting for news' in your general life; it's as if everything is developing outside of your control. Whichever job you touch, a glitch appears; the messages you expect always come incomplete or wrong; your energy is crawling on the floor. This card whispers that this 'scattered' state of yours has extinguished the creative fire within you. Why did you fall apart so easily and why did you take everything so lightly? You must pull yourself together immediately, determine your priorities, and take the ropes of your life back into your hands with seriousness. You still have that fire needed to be a hero; you just need to light it correctly.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, some obstacles, bad news, and disappointments in the general rhythm of life might be waiting for you, darling. Much more seriousness and discipline than you expect will be needed for those big changes you planned to happen. Instead of thinking 'everything will be very easy' in love and work, you should take your guard against the difficulties you will encounter. The fresh torch life will offer you will not light immediately or it might burn you when it lights, so you should be careful. If you learn to be patient and look at events from a more mature window, that wand will start shining again.

ask.gecmis: My dear, you have come to a very important crossroads in your past and your love life and have made a big decision for your own future. In that period, when you felt self-confident as if you held the world in your hands, you broke away from the patterns that limited you and set sail for a broader vision. That strategic step you took back then enabled you to become a woman today who knows what she wants in love and draws her boundaries. In those days, you learned to see love not just as an emotion but as a future plan.
ask.simdi: You are currently in a waiting and evaluating phase in your love life, honey; There may be two different paths or two different options in front of you. It's time to decide whether you will take your current relationship to the next level or open up to a completely new world. The power within you is so high that you have the capacity to make that path beautiful no matter which path you choose. Don't rush today, just look at your life from a high place and silently watch to which horizon your heart is beating.
ask.gelecek: Beautiful, in your future, love will take you to a period where much greater responsibilities and joint decisions await you. You will not only share romantic moments with the person you meet, but you will also build a common future and vision. Maybe a foreign love interest or the decision to move to another city may come to the fore. The future promises you the power to 'build your own world' in love; You will no longer be an extra, but the director of your own love story.

is.gecmis: Remember that strategic period in your career when you acted with a great vision and planned beyond your current job. The place you are in is too small for you and you have started to prepare for a greater success. The connections you made and the decisions you made during that period formed the basis of the strong stance you have in your professional life today. In those days, you laid the first stones by dreaming not only of today but also ten years later.
is.simdi: You are currently in a 'decision and planning' period in your business life, my dear; You weigh your data and plan your next big move. Your current position no longer satisfies you and you know very well that you can achieve more. Your plans are ready for a new partnership, a promotion, or a move to a completely different industry, you're just mustering up the courage to take that first step. Today the universe is telling you to 'keep your vision wide'; The world is in the palm of your hand, as long as you clarify what you want.
is.gelecek: A period awaits you in your future business life where you will be known as a 'strategy master' and you will be in charge of big projects. You can establish your own kingdom or undertake an initiative that will make a splash in the international arena. Your career will offer you not only success, but also the opportunity to know and manage the world. The future will make you say 'the real power is in the mind' in business life and will take you to a very respected leadership position. The roads will open before you one by one, be prepared.

para.gecmis: That visionary move or long-term investment plan you made in the past in financial matters has become the strongest shield protecting your budget today. At that time, you discovered how to use money not just for spending, but as a tool of power. The brave but rational financial decision you made those days makes you feel much more financially planned and secure today. You understood in those successful days that money is a brick that builds your future.
para.simdi: You are currently in a very important 'decision making' and investment planning period regarding your financial situation, honey. You have money, but you're at a crossroads on how to make it bigger. You are in a time of complete financial 'expansion'; The planning you do today can bring you unshakable wealth in the future. The universe tells you 'don't think small, aim for the world'; If you use this potential in your wallet wisely, you can hold the key to financial freedom.
para.gelecek: Your financial future looks very bright and wide-ranging, thanks to your strategic and forward-thinking moves. In the future, you will become a financial 'investment genius' and will multiply your properties and earnings. Money will no longer be a source of stress for you, it will be the powerful tool you use to travel the world and realize your dreams. The future heralds you a period of immense prosperity when money flows to you, admiring your intelligence.

saglik.gecmis: Remember that tremendous phase in the past when you established physical discipline about your health and began a long-term healing program. You saw your body as a trust and prepared it for the future and planned your habits from start to finish. This physical 'planned structure' you acquired during that period became the basis of that resilient and fit body that protects your body even today. You discovered in those days that health is not a one-day vision, but a lifelong vision.
saglik.simdi: My dear, right now your body is telling you 'think about the future'; It's time for you to decide to move your lifestyle to a healthier point. If you want to start a diet or exercise, you should see it as an investment not only for your appearance today, but also for your old age. You are at the right moment to make long-term plans that will strengthen your immune system. A small lifestyle change you make today will return you a healthy body in the future.
saglik.gelecek: Unshakable strength and a lifelong balance regarding your health awaits you in the future. Even as you get older, your forward-thinking and disciplined attitude will always keep your body fresh and alive. Diseases will stay far away from you because you will have already understood the language of your body and taken precautions accordingly. The future promises you a healthy and energetic life where you wake up with great peace every morning; You are the architect of your own health.

hepsi.gecmis: Remember that moment in your life when you had big dreams as if you wanted to 'conquer the world' and made a plan for those dreams. That's when you took those two sticks in your hand, planted one on the ground and extended the other to the future. Those brave and visionary decisions you made at that time are the strongest compass for success in every aspect of your life today. In those days, you actually started to draw your own destiny with your own hands.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, you are in a 'vision and decision' phase of your life right now; There is a vast sea in front of you and you are about to choose which ship to board. Realize the tremendous power within you and implement the big plan you've been waiting for. Whatever you decide today will be powerful enough to shape your next decade. Don't be afraid, look high and say 'my world, my rules'; The universe applauds your determined stance.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future looks like a bright and successful path shaped by your strategic intelligence and broad horizon. You are entering a process where everything in your life works as you planned and every intention of yours comes true with great victory. A life awaits you where people admire your foresight and power, and you rule the world with your new projects. The future will say to you 'you have succeeded, now you rule your own world' and will greet you!

ask.gecmis: You may have experienced a period in the past where you postponed that big choice you had to make in love or could not leave your safe space because of your fears. Maybe you knew you deserved better, but you were afraid to take risks and settled for what you had. This 'indecision' and lack of vision at that time may prevent you from reaching full satisfaction in your relationships even today. At that time, it was as if you were a guest in someone else's world instead of building your own world.
ask.simdi: My dear, you are currently 'stuck' and lacking direction in your love life; It's like you have the world in your hands but you don't know where to go. Because you are afraid to make a decision, you stall both yourself and the other person, and this drains your energy. Actually, you have options, but you choose to stay in that safe haven where you are unhappy rather than taking risks. If you don't come down from that tower today, those great opportunities in your love life will pass you by, wake up!
ask.gelecek: The risk that awaits you in love in the future may be missing out on lasting happiness because of your indecisiveness or living uneasily with a constant feeling of 'this is not for me'. If you don't change your 'comfort zone' obsession, you may always experience that feeling of incompleteness in your future relationships. If you want true happiness in the future, you must first decide what you want and take that step courageously. Otherwise, your love life may always remain in a preparation phase.

is.gecmis: There was a time in your career when a great opportunity was at your door and you closed that door because of your lack of vision or your fear of 'what if I fail'. Maybe you turned down a bigger job offer, or maybe you couldn't make that final push to start your own business. This 'timid' attitude at that time may have created a feeling of 'regret' or 'what am I doing here' in your professional life today. It's like you've imprisoned your own potential for the sake of fear.
is.simdi: You are currently suffering from a 'blockage' and planning error in your business life, honey; Things aren't moving forward because you don't know which way to go. Your current job limits you, but you don't do the research necessary to chart a new path. This may make you seem 'unproductive' or 'unambitious' at work. Instead of being ambitious these days, you should first gather your scattered mind and make a realistic future plan; Otherwise you will continue to stagnate.
is.gelecek: The danger that awaits you in your future business life may be that you cannot make that 'expected exit' and remain stuck in mediocrity or lose your achievements due to wrong planning. If you don't broaden your vision and silence that 'coward' voice today, you may fall far behind your competitors in the future. To maintain your future success, you must stop saying 'that's enough' and regain that big world vision. Otherwise, your career path may always remain at that 'almost done' stop.

para.gecmis: A 'planning mistake' or a visionless expenditure you made in the past in financial matters may still affect your budget today. That period when you chose to just live your day instead of managing money has made you more insecure and limited today. Maybe you missed a great investment opportunity because it was 'risky', now you are watching what that opportunity brings to others. This 'financial fear' at that time drags you into a state of unnecessary pessimism every time you look at your wallet today.
para.simdi: You are currently in a serious 'decision-free' and crisis phase regarding your financial situation, my dear; You don't know where to spend your budget or how to evaluate it. You want to make a financial breakthrough, but you cannot foresee or you trust wrong data. These days, you should be very careful when making financial decisions and avoid ways that promise 'quick wealth'; Every move made without vision will only cause you more harm.
para.gelecek: The biggest risk that awaits you in your financial future may be not being able to see the huge opportunities that come your way because of your fears or losing your savings due to inadequate planning. If you do not regain the discipline and forward-thinking attitude to manage money today, you may always live with a feeling of financial 'inadequacy' in the future. If you want prosperity in the future, you need to redefine your financial goals and be bolder. Otherwise, you may always remain in that financial crisis of 'making ends meet'.

saglik.gecmis: You may still be dealing with some complaints today because you did not plan and neglected a situation related to your health in the past, saying 'it will pass anyway'. Your body told you 'you need to change' but you chose to hold on to your old, harmful habits. This state of 'procrastination' you experienced at that time may have left you with fatigue and resistance to the healing process even today. At that time, it seemed like you pushed your own healing aside simply because of your lack of vision and lack of discipline.
saglik.simdi: You are currently in a state of 'indecision' and energy blockage regarding your health, honey; You don't know which treatment or diet to believe in. Your body is giving an alarm, but you put yourself to sleep by saying 'it will pass', or you start a program and quit it the next day. This instability makes you more tired inside. These days, you should see a specialist and urgently complete that health plan you left unfinished; Your body is so tired of your 'confused' attitude.
saglik.gelecek: The problems you may experience with your health in the future may be chronic pain caused by inactivity or digestive problems caused by wrong nutrition. If you don't get your lifestyle in order and create that future vision today, your body may give you a much harsher 'stop' warning in the future. To be fitter in the future, you need to chart a health route now and stick to it. Health will only last when you take it seriously.

hepsi.gecmis: You stopped that big change and vision that you should have experienced in a past period of your life because of your own fears or your belief that 'I won't be disturbed'. Destiny left you the world in your hands, but you gave it back because you couldn't bear that weight. This feeling of 'stuckness' you experienced at that time creates a feeling of 'incompleteness' in your entire life today. It's like you feel like your time is wasted and you're still waiting on that old threshold.
hepsi.simdi: There is chaos in your life right now because you have to make a big decision, but you close your eyes and wait for everything to get better on its own, dear; This is your biggest mistake. Opportunities are waiting at your door, but you cannot find the courage to open that door. He should shake himself up as soon as possible, realize the world in his hands and ask 'where do I want to go?' you should ask. If your perspective does not change, your life will not open a new door for you; You must take that step.
hepsi.gelecek: The process that awaits you in the future may be a recurring regret of 'I wish I had done' if you do not change this indecisive and visionless attitude. You can miss the great beginnings that life offers you only because you cannot make that final decision. To save your future, you must learn 'courage' and long-term planning today. Otherwise, life may leave you in even greater despair at a point you never wanted; be alert!

ask.gecmis: My dear, remember that hopeful period in your past when you patiently waited for the seeds you planted in love to bear fruit and watched the horizon. You took a chance on someone, made a big investment in a relationship, and waited for their ship to dock. The wise patience you showed at that time is the greatest proof of how durable and loyal you can be in love today. You discovered in those days that love is not just a moment, but a 'waiting' and 'effort'.
ask.simdi: You are currently at that exciting moment in your love life, honey, when the ships are slowly starting to appear on the horizon and your preparations are bearing fruit! If you have set your intentions for someone or want to grow your relationship, the news and opportunities you have been waiting for are on their way. Now you should not just wait, you should start preparing to welcome those ships. Today, you are in that magnificent process in love where your vision expands, you can imagine beyond the limits and everything works in your favor; Keep your eyes on the horizon.
ask.gelecek: Beautiful, in your future, love will lead you to complete 'expansion' and world-wide happiness. Your bond with the person you will meet will grow so much that maybe you will sail to a new city, a new country or a completely new lifestyle together. This relationship will be fruitful, safe and long-lasting enough to make you say 'it was worth the wait'. The future promises you that time of tremendous celebration when the brightest ships of love will dock; be ready

is.gecmis: Remember that bright period in your career when you reaped the first fruits of that big initiative or project you started in the past and watched the horizon to expand your business. You not only stood your ground, you showed tremendous courage to exceed your limits. This 'expansion' energy at that time allows you to be remembered as a 'successful entrepreneur' even today in your professional life. In those days, you set out your ships dreaming not only of today but also of global success.
is.simdi: You are currently in a period of 'harvest and new horizons' in your business life, my dear; Those important news, job offers or partnerships you've been waiting for are about to arrive! Your efforts are finally coming to light and you are now ready to play bigger. Your vision at work is so broad that everyone admires your foresight. Today is the time for you to 'bring your ships to the harbour'; Complete your preparations, because the great opportunity you have been waiting for has appeared on the horizon right now.
is.gelecek: A tremendous period awaits you in your future business life, where your name will be synonymous with 'success and expansion' and you will undertake international projects. You will come to a point where you will no longer seek your work, but your work will seek you, and every door will open for you by itself. Maybe you will take your own empire abroad, or maybe you will take over the management of a global brand. The future promises you tremendous satisfaction in your career that will make you say 'the great success I have been waiting for has arrived'.

para.gecmis: Your patient investment or long-term plan in financial matters in the past has become your greatest source of abundance protecting your budget today. In those brave days, you discovered how to set out to grow money, not just to save it. That visionary financial decision you made back then makes you feel much more financially free and like someone who 'has a ship' today. In those successful days, you made money work for you and bring you abundance from far away.
para.simdi: You're in a tremendous 'rise and wait' period with your finances right now, honey; The big money, compensation or investments you have been waiting for are on the way! You are in a time of complete financial 'expansion'; The seeds you planted today have begun to appear as fruits on the horizon. The universe is telling you 'get ready, abundance is coming'; This movement in his wallet is the first harbinger of his unshakable wealth in the future. Keep your eyes on the horizon, your ships are about to dock at the harbour.
para.gelecek: Your financial future looks very bright and rich, thanks to your patient and forward-thinking moves. You should realize that this fake silence actually undermines the bond between you even more. That old rivalry with your partner may be over, but in its place is a huge void. If you don't honestly reveal your suppressed feelings today, this inner war will slowly destroy you; Talking is not fighting, remember.
ask.gelecek: The risk that awaits you in love in the future may be to turn into a completely ineffective partner while trying to avoid conflict, or to sweep the problems under the carpet and eventually have a big explosion. If you don't change this 'wimpy' or 'too compliant' attitude, you may always be that 'invisible' person in your future relationships. If you want true happiness in the future, you must learn to raise your voice and defend your rights when necessary. Otherwise, your love life may remain like a theater directed by someone else.

is.gecmis: Remember that time in your career when you were so fed up with intense competition that you settled for a lower but peaceful position. Maybe you didn't stand up for your rights in a project, or maybe you resigned to escape the chaos at work. This state of 'giving up the struggle' at that time may have created a feeling of 'lack of ambition' or 'inability to prove oneself' in his professional life today. Back then, it seemed like you pushed your own potential aside just because you were tired.
is.simdi: Right now, my dear, you are experiencing the pain of being lost in 'inertia' and chaos in your business life; Your competitors are finishing the job but you are just watching. Problems accumulate and you stay in the background, saying 'it can't be solved anyway'. This can make you look 'ineffective' or 'given up' at work. These days you have to reawaken your ambition and get out of that chaos and say 'I am here'; Otherwise, this recession may end your entire career, wake up!
is.gelecek: The danger that awaits you in your future business life may be that you cannot make that 'expected exit' and constantly remain in the background or avoid all kinds of responsibilities while trying to avoid conflicts. If you don't regain that competitive spirit today, you may fall far behind your competitors in the future. To protect your future success, you must remember the truth that 'rights are not given, they are taken'. Otherwise, your career path may always remain at that 'I'm getting by' stop.

para.gecmis: In financial matters, those 'don't worry' payments you made in the past or that period when you did not pursue the money that was rightfully yours may have lost its abundance today. It's like you let someone exploit you instead of managing your money, and you opened your wallet to avoid arguing. This 'financial abandonment' at that time has caused you to feel much more passive and inadequate towards money today. At that time, you gave away your blessings to others just to remain silent.
para.simdi: You are currently feeling a serious sense of 'loss of rights' and inaction regarding your financial situation, my dear; Some people are taking their rights, but you are silent! There is a financial mess, but you are afraid to even check the accounts. You have to be much braver when making financial decisions these days and say 'this is my right'; Otherwise, you may lose the last savings you have to others in this chaos. Silence doesn't make you rich, it just makes you more exploited.
para.gelecek: The biggest risk that awaits you in your financial future may be to suffer great losses because you do not seek your legal rights or to settle for much less than you are entitled to inheritance/partnership. If you do not raise your financial voice today, you may always remain in financial 'dependence on others' in the future. If you want prosperity in the future, you must learn to protect your money and fight for it. Otherwise, you may stay in a cycle where you become poor financially, always saying 'good luck, good health'.

saglik.gecmis: Remember that exhausting time in the past when you gave up a struggle with your health (illness, addiction, weight) and said 'I can't deal with it anymore'. Your body told you 'help', but you were so tired of that inner chaos that you ignored your health. This state of 'giving up' that you experienced at that time may have left you with disbelief and resistance to recovery even today. It seems like you've made your own healing a burden just because of your fatigue.
saglik.simdi: You are currently in an 'introvert collapse' and energy blockage regarding your health, honey; You don't take good care of your body because you think 'it's not getting better anyway'. You suffer in silence or sweep the symptoms under the rug. This situation makes you much heavier physically. You should see a specialist these days and hear those bodily screams that you have silenced; Healing will only come back when you truly decide to 'fight to heal', wake up!
saglik.gelecek: The problems you may experience with your health in the future may be internal diseases caused by repressed anger or muscle losses caused by inactivity. If you don't get your lifestyle in order today and rekindle that joy of living, your body may give you a much harsher 'it's too late' warning in the future. To be fitter in the future, you need to start fighting for your health, even if it is small steps. Health only comes to you when you don't give up.

hepsi.gecmis: With your own hands, you stopped that great awakening and struggle that you should have experienced in a past period of your life, and you bowed down by saying 'this is my destiny'. While fate offered you an opportunity, you took a step back and escaped from that chaos, thinking you would get tired. This feeling of 'stuckness' you experienced at that time creates a feeling of 'incompleteness' in your entire life today. It's like you feel like time is wasted and you're still waiting without winning that old war.
hepsi.simdi: There is a silence in your life right now, but this is not peace, it is the calm before a storm, my dear; You don't solve the problems, you just postpone them. You ignore the great call that life makes to you, and this exhausts you spiritually. You need to shake yourself up as soon as possible, fight your battles for righteousness in the right place and say 'I'm here'. This escape only makes you more unhappy. If your perspective does not change, your life will not write a new victory for you; You need to pick up that sword.
hepsi.gelecek: The process that awaits you in the future may be a recurring misfortune of 'being an extra in other lives' if you do not change this attitude of giving up. You can miss the tremendous successes that life offers you only because you cannot put up that necessary struggle. To save your future, you must learn to 'seek your rights' and face difficulties today. Otherwise, life may leave you with a much greater disappointment at a point you never wanted; be alert!

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you experienced a magnificent period of victory in your love life where you were welcomed like a hero and envied by everyone. Those days when you were appreciated in public with the person who won your heart gave you great self-confidence. Those moments when you felt like there was nothing you couldn't achieve when you joined hands with your loved one still shine in your memory. Perhaps overcoming a difficult obstacle to reach your beloved was a success celebrated even by those around you. You proved to everyone back then how to reach the peak with the power of love.
ask.simdi: Darling, right now you are in a period of being appreciated and shining in your love life; everyone is literally talking about you! You have achieved such harmony in your relationship that your partner holds you in high esteem and is proud of you. If you are single, you attract all the attention in every environment you enter, and the number of those who want to steal your heart is increasing day by day. This card whispers that it is time to enjoy the victory you have won emotionally and to refresh your self-confidence. You are the victor of love and you deserve this happiness to the fullest.
ask.gelecek: In your future, there is such a great victory in the name of love that you will see it was worth all your waiting and efforts. The magnificent relationship you seek will bring you not only happiness but also a great social status and respect. Days are near when you will walk proudly hand in hand with that person who will be the conqueror of your heart under the admiring gazes of everyone. All the emotional turmoils you have experienced will end and you will be seated on the most glorious throne of love. Get ready honey, a victory parade is starting for you in love!

is.gecmis: In your past, you achieved such a success in business life that your name was passed from mouth to mouth and everyone gave you a standing ovation. That period, when you successfully completed a project or hit a big goal right in the bullseye, became one of the brightest pages of your career. The praises you received from your superiors and the admiration of your colleagues moved your professional identity to a very solid place. That pride you felt in that moment of victory has been the biggest fuel for your working determination today. You learned with all your heart back then what a victory song success is.
is.simdi: Honey, right now you are on a complete wave of rise and success in your career; you are literally running from success to success! You are in a period where you receive the rewards of your labor in a concrete way, and if you are expecting a promotion or a big prize, it's the perfect time. Everyone is talking about your talents and your ideas are accepted as golden at work. This card represents a moment where you show off your leadership qualities and walk to the top by leaving your rivals behind. Keep shining darling, right now the podium is yours and all the lights are on you.
is.gelecek: In your future, there is the news of a magnificent crowning regarding your career goals and being recognized by large audiences. You will lead such a project or achieve such a success that your name will become a brand in your industry. This victory you win after all the difficult processes will bring you a great satisfaction both financially and spiritually. Soon you will climb the career steps running and plant the flag of victory at the very top when you reach your goal. Success is in your destiny, just prepare for that glorious day.

para.gecmis: In your past, there was a period where you reaped the fruits of the right moves you made financially and won a financial victory. Perhaps an investment returned to you by multiplying, or maybe a large amount you deserved came into your hands and relieved you. That sense of security and success brought by money positioned you as 'someone who knows their business' in your circle. That financial independence you gained in that period allows you to maintain that confident stance in your spending habits even today. You celebrated the victory of abundance in its most magnificent form in the past, darling.
para.simdi: Honey, right now your wallet is literally having a feast; you are in a time where you come out profitable in financial matters and abundance increases! You are in moments where you realize a financial goal and experience the justified pride of it. If there is a money you are waiting for, good news, that money is coming to you with a great spiritual superiority, not just financially. This period is the time to proudly collect the returns of the investments you made and make bigger plans for your future. The energy of abundance is with you and you know very well how to enjoy this wealth.
para.gelecek: In your future, a complete rise and a great increase in wealth await you financially, darling. Those glorious days when financial worries completely end and you will obtain huge gains from the works you do are very close. Perhaps you will receive a magnificent return from an investment everyone called impossible and prove your financial genius. Everything you touch will turn into gold and you will experience the pride of sharing this wealth with your loved ones. Your future is full of bright golden sparkles, get ready to climb to the peak of prosperity.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you won a difficult struggle you gave regarding your health and witnessed the victory of your body. Those days when you successfully completed a healing process and felt more fit than ever taught you the value of life. Perhaps you achieved a magnificent result in a sports discipline or diet and surprised everyone. This vitality you gained in that period is the solidest foundation of your confidence in your body even today. You grasped very well the importance of health after that big victory back then.
saglik.simdi: Right now your health energy is at its peak; you are as radiant and powerful as a star preparing to take the stage! You are in a period where every cell in your body is filled with the joy of life and the praises you receive about your physical appearance increase. If you are in a treatment process, the moments when the results will come out perfect and you will declare the victory of healing are very near. That reflection you see in the mirror as a reward for the value you give yourself also gives great peace to your soul. You are literally challenging the world with a healthy and strong body.
saglik.gelecek: The health picture waiting for you in the future promises a complete dynamism and long-lasting vitality. Days are at the door when you will push the limits of your physical capacity and receive miraculous results, and your mastery over your body will increase. Even in old age, you will have an energy that everyone will admire and you will be shown as an example with your health. A magnificent future awaits you where every kind of physical fatigue will leave its place to an unquenchable fire of life. Healing will be with you and you will always stay upright and healthy.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a 'champion' energy in every field; in a period of your life, you turned all the arrows to yourself and won great victories. That golden age when you caught peace in love, success in work, and vitality in health simultaneously was your greatest source of motivation. Those days when everyone talked about you and took you as an example are full of the most beautiful memories that feed your soul. You showed the whole world back then how to overcome difficulties and reach victory. Success was engraved in your soul in those times, honey.
hepsi.simdi: Darling, right now a victory parade is taking place in every area of your life; everything is resulting in victory exactly as you wanted! You are in a magnificent balance where you enjoy being loved in love, being successful in work, and financial prosperity at the same time. Your self-confidence is so high that every step you take arouses admiration around you. This card says it is a time of celebration for you and you should proudly declare all the victories you have won. Life is applauding you honey, you are a winner who has brought the world to its knees right now.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future promises a magnificent wholeness where you will reach the peak in every area of life and say 'I made it.' While you rise to the highest office in your career, you will also live that great happiness with your soulmate in love in front of everyone's eyes. A period where no financial deficiency remains and your health shines brightly will enter your life very soon. That moment when all your dreams come true will be the biggest victory parade of your life. The universe has made all its preparations and is waiting to reward you, get ready to enjoy the victory!

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you thought you won a victory in love but at the moment you expected it, you didn't see the appreciation you expected and experienced disappointment. Perhaps you tried very hard in a relationship but your partner ignored this effort of yours and hurt your pride. That big love story you expected everyone to envy might have ended with a sad ending behind the scenes. This feeling of being excluded that you experienced in that period casts a shadow on your effort to prove yourself in love today. You met the pain of defeat while waiting for victory back then.
ask.simdi: Right now, you might be struggling with a sense of 'inadequacy' or 'not being seen' in your love life. You feel as if all the burden is on your shoulders in your relationship and you complain about not receiving even a 'thank you' in return. If you are single, thinking that you are not noticed in the environments you enter might be pulling your self-confidence down. This card says that ego conflicts and misunderstandings consume your love energy. You should step back a bit and realize your own value before presenting it to the approval of others.
ask.gelecek: In your future, it is possible that the big celebration you expect regarding love will be delayed a bit or not create the excitement you expect. Entering into superiority wars like 'I love more' or 'I give more effort' in your relationships might wear you out. To reach that magnificent happiness you seek, you will need to put aside caring about what others think. Victory is near, but to reach it, you must first overcome that sense of worthlessness and be patient. You will enter a period where you should seek peace, not ambition, in love.

is.gecmis: In your past, someone tripping you up just as you were about to rise in your career or giving the promotion you expected to someone else shook you deeply. That period when your labor was stolen or your successes were ignored must have damaged your trust in business life a bit. Those days when you doubted your own talents and asked 'why not me?' were the most difficult test of your professional life. You had done everything to get on the victory podium but it wasn't your destiny that day, darling. This situation made you more ambitious but also more fragile.
is.simdi: Honey, right now you might feel that you do not see the value you deserve at work and your successes remain in the shadow. Perhaps the failure of a project or the lack of expected appreciation has brought your motivation down to zero. Watching the successes of others and thinking that you are stalling shouldn't put you into a 'loser' psychology. Now is the time to stop and review your strategy; perhaps you are waiting for approval from the wrong people. Remember, real success is not the applause of others, but the work you are truly satisfied with yourself.
is.gelecek: In your future, you might face some delays regarding your career plans and the risk of losing reputation in the eyes of the public. You might have difficulty creating that 'wow' effect you expect in an important presentation or project, so double your preparations. It could be a period where your rivals try to get ahead of you, but this shouldn't daunt you, it just whispers for you to be more careful. It will take some time to plant the flag of victory, but the lessons you learn in this process will make you a stronger leader. Be patient and don't lose your light, those applauses will eventually come.

para.gecmis: In your past, you might have taken a financial blow when things went wrong at the last moment while expecting a big gain financially. An investment where you said 'this business is done' not giving the result you expected or the lack of abundance of money tired you quite a bit back then. Your stalling while others got rich must have damaged your financial self-confidence. This financial disappointment in those days causes you to act always with a fear today when spending. While you were waiting for the victory of money, you took the lesson of deficiency.
para.simdi: Honey, you might feel a 'lack of abundance' in your wallet right now; money comes but it goes away quickly as if it was never yours. Feeling unsuccessful in financial matters or being crushed under debts pulls your current energy down. Perhaps you didn't receive the return on an investment or the expected raise/bonus news didn't come. This situation is a temporary blockage, you just need to stop seeing money as a show of power. To reach the energy of abundance, you must first know the value of what you have and avoid ostentation.
para.gelecek: In your future, it appears that the big exit you expect financially will take a bit more time and your financial plans might be interrupted. If you are waiting for a property sale or a large payment, some obstacles and delays might annoy you. You should be very careful about not having the debts you gave to others returned or about wrong investments. The gate of wealth is not yet fully ajar, so you should progress cautiously and avoid big risks. The victory of abundance is on the horizon, but the road requires a bit more patience and planning.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, a healing process regarding your health progressing slower than you expected or the recurrence of a disease saddened you considerably. Your energy dropping at the moment you said 'I'm finally well' or experiencing a physical weakness triggered the fear of 'will I never be able to get better?'. There were days when you felt alone and weak in this health struggle you gave back then. While you wanted to celebrate the victory of health, your body reminded you in a harsh language that you needed to rest. This lack of resistance in those days somewhat weakened your faith in your health.
saglik.simdi: Darling, right now you might feel yourself in a 'defeat' physically; your energy is very low and it's as if no treatment works. Not being satisfied with your image in the mirror or small ailments coming one after another breaks your morale. This card says that your spiritual fatigue reflects on your body and that actually that 'success' ambition within you consumes you. You should stop for a bit and listen to your body and stop putting so much pressure on yourself. Healing will only be truly with you when you show yourself compassion.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, if you are not a bit more attentive regarding health issues, there is a risk that your immune system will let you down, darling. Neglecting your body while running toward your goals might lead to chronic fatigues or stress-related diseases in the future. That state of full healing you expect will only come when you radically change your lifestyle and are patient. A period awaits you where your energy will be fluctuating, sometimes feeling very fit and sometimes very tired. Your love for yourself will be your greatest medicine, never forget this.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general energy of 'not being appreciated' and 'half-finished victories'; life has tested you many times. That feeling of withdrawal just as you were about to reach the peak in love, work, and financial matters must have worn you out quite a bit. Those days when you thought your right was being usurped while you applauded the successes of others must have left deep marks in your soul. While you were expecting a victory in every area of life, the universe gave you the lesson of patience and submission. This 'staying in the shade' state back then made you more cautious today.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, right now a sense of 'stalling' and 'not being approved' might prevail in your general life; it's as if you can't make your voice heard by anyone. Whichever job you touch, something feels missing and you can't get that big applause you expect. This situation is not because you are untalented, but just because your energy is channeled in the wrong place right now. Everything will change when you stop caring about what others think and start celebrating your own small victories. Now is the time to give yourself a chance and awaken that broken champion within you.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, some obstacles and slowdowns on the road to success might be waiting for you in the general rhythm of life, honey. Those big changes you planned will take longer than you expected to happen and your patience will be tested in this process. Instead of saying 'I am the best' in love and work, you might need to follow a more modest and strategic path. The victory torch life will offer you will not light immediately, but all the materials needed to light that torch will be in your hands. You just have to wait for the right time and continue walking without giving up.

ask.gecmis: Darling, in your past, you literally performed a fortress defense in your love life, you challenged everyone to protect your relationship or your feelings. Someone might have tried to come between you or people around you might have opposed the person you loved, but you stood tall. This struggle you experienced back then showed the whole world what a passionate and loyal lover you are. Those days when you had to defend your own value and fight for your love made you a much stronger character. You understood back then that love is a battlefield but victory is possible.
ask.simdi: Honey, right now you might feel as if you are under attack from all directions in your love life, but don't worry, the real power is with you! You have developed a magnificent defense mechanism against external pressures, gossip, or your own inner doubts about your relationship. If you are single, instead of opening your heart immediately, you protect your boundaries and pass those who want to approach you through a sieve. This card says it is the perfect time to stand by what you know is right and own your love. You are currently on a high hill emotionally and you have no intention of coming down.
ask.gelecek: In your future, an important test you must give in the name of love and a big struggle for respect you must win appear. Perhaps you will need to brave a difficulty for your relationship, but this situation will make your bond even more unshakable. The brave steps you will take to protect your heart will eventually bring you that peaceful and safe harbor you seek. Every defense you make for your love in the future will also prove to your partner how solid your character is. Finally, you will repel all your rivals and obstacles one by one, victory will be yours, darling.

is.gecmis: In your past, you entered such a competition in business life that you fought day and night to protect your place. In that period when your rivals came after you and your talents were questioned, you surprised everyone by never taking a step back. That perseverance you showed to defend your own ideas and own your projects has been the foundation of your solid stance in your career today. This pressure you experienced in those days proved what a resilient leader you are in a professional sense. You successfully came out of the wolf's table of the business world with a clean record back then.
is.simdi: Honey, right now you are in a complete 'challenge' in business life and everyone has their eyes fixed on you. Perhaps you are trying to protect the leadership of a project or you are standing tall against those who want to shake your position at work. This card says you shouldn't give up right now because your ideas and stance are far superior to others. Even if difficulties come one after another, your strategic intelligence and working ambition have the power to overcome every obstacle. Right now you are the master of the field, just keep your defense solid and don't be afraid to showcase your talents.
is.gelecek: In your future, a big competitive environment that will come your way while reaching your career goals awaits you, darling. You will reach such a point that many people will want to be in your place and this will force you to be constantly on guard. However, this situation will consolidate your success; every attack will make you shine even more and you will prove your expertise to everyone. You might need to give a serious struggle for a responsibility you will soon take, but eventually victory will be registered with your signature. You will climb the career steps by defending and stay alone at the very top.

para.gecmis: In your past, you showed a very great resistance to protect your financial resources and get out of a financial crisis, honey. Perhaps you created a shield against those who wanted to take the money you earned from your hand or against wrong investments. Those harsh steps you took to ensure your financial security allow you to act more planned today. That financial pressure you experienced back then taught you that money is not earned easily but if defended correctly, it will always stay with you. You came out victorious from that big war you gave for your financial freedom.
para.simdi: Honey, right now you are in a financial struggle period where you need to protect your wallet and investments. Perhaps a payment you are waiting for is delayed or your expenses are piled up, but you are trying to keep them all under control. This card whispers that you should be very careful about your spending right now and not let others grab the money in your hand. Don't let the obstacles you encounter while trying to establish a financial superiority daunt you, because your saving plans are very solid. Now is the time to defend your budget and stand tall economically.
para.gelecek: In your future, a competition or investment war that will challenge you a bit financially but eventually make you profitable appears. While acquiring a property or making a big business deal, you will neutralize the rivals you encounter with clever moves. This test you give before making a leap financially will reveal your financial genius. Every move you make to protect your money in the future will open the gate of a larger wealth for you. Eventually, your wallet will shout out cries of victory and you will sit peacefully within that abundance.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a period of resistance regarding your health and witnessed that magnificent war your body showed against a disease. Those days when you felt very tired physically but your soul never gave up proved how strong your life energy is. Perhaps your disciplined stance against a treatment even surprised your doctors. That struggle you gave back then to defend your health has been the biggest protector of your solid body today. You learned back then what it means to fight to stay at peace with your body.
saglik.simdi: Honey, right now you are making a great effort to protect the energy in your body and show resistance against stress factors. You are trying not to let negative energies or intense working tempo affect your health. This card warns you about keeping your immunity high right now and not pushing your limits too much. Defending your own healing and taking time to rest should be your biggest duty right now. You are very resilient physically, just focus on managing this power correctly and protecting yourself from external factors.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a process appears that will tire you a bit regarding health but eventually lead you to a stronger body, darling. Perhaps you will enter a sports camp or successfully complete a very strict diet program to challenge yourself. This big war you will give against habits that will harm your body will carry you to a vitality that will last for years. Every determined step you take to protect your health in the future will open the gate of a long and high-quality life for you. That magnificent will to overcome every physical difficulty will be with you, don't worry.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'struggle' and 'resistance' energy; life has tried to corner you many times but you have kept your wand upright every time. Those honorable wars you gave to defend your rights in love, work, and personal life made you the unshakable person you are today. Those steps you climbed without being beholden to anyone shine like an indelible power medal in your soul. You showed the entire universe back then how to stay on your feet in difficulties and how to brave every kind of pressure. Your past is not a story of a victory, but a legend of a resistance, honey.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, right now you are in a phase of 'proving yourself' and 'protecting your position' in every area of your life; you are literally like an army of one! You have drawn your boundaries so clearly that no one can pass easily in this period when everyone expects something from you or challenges you. This card says you shouldn't doubt the correctness of where you stand right now and you shouldn't lower your wand. Even though these simultaneous struggles you give in your career, love, and health tire you, you are the winning side right now. Protect your light and never come down from that hill.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future points to a period when you will win great respect in every area of life but you will need to put in a serious effort for this. The obstacles and rivals you encounter will only sharpen you even more and bring your talents to the highest level. Every struggle you give to protect your peace in love, your position at work, and your health will eventually bring you an absolute authority. In the future, everyone will understand what an unshakable character you have and will bow respectfully before you. Your wand will always be high, your soul will always be victorious in your life journey, honey.

ask.gecmis: Honey, unfortunately, you fell tired in that big struggle you gave in love in your past and had to withdraw. Despite doing your best to protect your relationship, you must remember how the external factors or your partner's indifference crushed you. Perhaps you closed the doors of your heart to everyone for a period and even gave up on making a defense. This sense of giving up in those days causes you to take more insecure and timid steps in love today. You are a soul who left wounded from the war of love in those days.
ask.simdi: Darling, right now you are in a 'surrender' but a sad surrender in your love life; it's as if you have no strength left to fight anymore. You are so tired of being constantly criticized in your relationship or from social pressure in your loneliness that you have given up on protecting your boundaries. This card says that your self-confidence is very low right now and you are letting people exploit your emotions. Think about why you lowered your wand and why you gave up so easily, honey. Love will not bring you that expected respect as long as you do not defend your own value.
ask.gelecek: In your future, in some situations you will experience in the name of love, you have the risk of stepping back and missing opportunities due to your fears. Giving up immediately in the face of obstacles will encounter might postpone that big happiness your heart seeks for a while longer. You might experience being crushed under dominant characters in your relationships or not being able to express your feelings. However, this situation is a lesson given to you to learn to draw your boundaries. If you don't learn to keep your wand upright in the future, you cannot escape being a minor character in your love life.

is.gecmis: In your past, you were under such pressure in business life that you either fell defeated against your rivals or were forced to give up on your project. The number of those coming after you and your loneliness might have caused you to experience a regression in your career for a period. Those days when you couldn't defend your ideas and your talents remained in the shadow have somewhat disillusioned you professionally. That time when you couldn't manage to protect your own fortress causes you to say 'I can never be as ambitious as before' in business life today. You were crushed under the weight of competition in those days, honey.
is.simdi: Darling, right now you are experiencing a complete 'burnout' and 'escape' state in business life; it's as if responsibilities are coming over you like an avalanche. You seem to have no strength left to resist the gossip at work or the unfair competition. This card whispers that you are currently indecisive and your rivals are watching for your weak moment. If you don't pull yourself together immediately and own your own ideas, you have the risk of losing your position or prestige.
