hepsi.simdi: There is chaos in your life right now because you think everything is coming at you and you are about to give up just when you are about to succeed, dear; This is your biggest mistake. There are opportunities, but you are so afraid of that pressure that you remain inactive. You need to shake yourself up as soon as possible, pick up that stick again and say 'I'm here until the end'. If your perspective does not change, your life will not write a new victory for you; You need to show that resistance, it's almost time!
hepsi.gelecek: The process that awaits you in the future may be a recurring misfortune of 'being an extra in other lives' if you do not change this attitude of giving up. You can miss the tremendous successes that life offers you only because you cannot show the necessary resistance. To save your future, you must put 'courage' and setting limits at the center of your life again today. Otherwise, life may leave you with a much greater disappointment at a point you never wanted; Be alert and be on your guard!

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you literally shouldered the burden of the whole world alone in your love life; you made so many sacrifices to keep your relationship alive that your soul fell weary. Those days when you also took on the responsibilities of your partner and you solved every problem turned you into a 'load carrier' in love. Perhaps you had completely forgotten your own happiness while trying to drag a relationship alone. This emotional weight you experienced back then causes you to look at love more distantly and tiredly today. You were literally crushed in those days when love turned into a mountain of responsibility.
ask.simdi: Darling, right now you are under so much responsibility and pressure in your love life that you can't even see ahead of you! Trying to control every detail in your relationship or worrying about all the problems of your partner drags you into an emotional burnout. If you are single, you still carry the burdens of the past and the fear of 'what if the same things happen again' on your back. This card whispers that you should take a break right now and leave some of these heavy loads. Love should not be a burden but a sharing; why are you trying to do everything alone, honey?
ask.gelecek: In your future, a process appears that will tire you out a lot in the name of love, adeta a test in quality but eventually bring a great relief. Perhaps a marriage preparation or a serious responsibility awaits you, but be careful not to be crushed under this burden. If you do not share tasks with your partner, a big explosion might occur at the end of the relationship. This period says you are very close to your goal but you need to carry those heavy wands with a final effort. Be patient honey, the top of that mountain is near; when you reach it, you will drop all your loads and take a deep breath.

is.gecmis: In your past, you entered such a tempo in business life that you were literally drowned among overtime and projects, honey. Those times when you took on every job saying 'I do it best' or you solved all the crises at work brought you to the point of finishing physically. This unending working ambition of yours in those days is the main reason for your professional fatigue today. You tried to carry all the wands of the business world alone back then, darling.
is.simdi: Honey, right now you are in a complete 'overload' state in business life; you don't even have time to scratch your head! Your shoulders have fallen from saying 'yes' to everyone and taking on every responsibility, and your energy is exhausted. This card says that this current tempo of yours is not sustainable and you might encounter a health problem or the risk of making a mistake very soon. Please learn to delegate and don't be afraid to hand over some works to others. You are not a machine, darling, you are about to be crushed under these wands right now, lighten up a bit!
is.gelecek: In your future, the final and biggest struggle you must give to reach your career goals awaits you. Such a project or position awaits you that its responsibilities will make you sweat a lot and make you lose sleep. However, when you successfully deliver this load to the goal, you will experience the greatest reward and relief of your life. This card whispers that you are very close to the end of the road but the weight of the wands will be felt most now. You will find the strength to carry these loads in the future but you should absolutely give a long rest break afterwards.

para.gecmis: In your past, you came under a big financial burden, trying to breathe among debts or heavy payments, honey. Perhaps you took on a family debt or carried the installments of a wrong investment on your back for years. Even if there was abundance of money, that financial pressure on your shoulders prevented you from enjoying life. This financial weight you experienced in that period causes you to approach money always with the belief 'it is earned with difficulty' today. You literally carried stones for your financial freedom in those days, honey.
para.simdi: Darling, right now there is a magnificent pressure on your wallet and in your mind about money; you have literally fallen weary from turning over debts or trying to make ends meet. Your financial responsibilities have increased so much that you cannot even enjoy the money you earn. This card says that you should urgently restrict your spending right now and put your financial loads in an order. You should immediately give up on unnecessary installments and taking on the financial burdens of others. Time has come to drop these heavy wands one by one for you to be the master, not the slave, of money.
para.gelecek: In your future, a big payment or investment process appears that will challenge you one last time financially but eventually bring you to prosperity. Perhaps you will enter into a housing loan or sign under a heavy debt to grow your business. Even though this process will tire you out a lot and cause you to lead a limited life, the place you eventually reach will be a complete financial peak. You should be patient while carrying these financial loads in the future and focus on that big prize at the end of the road. Those wands will eventually turn into gold but it will be a bit laborious to carry, honey.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you experienced such a period of fatigue regarding your health that your body literally gave an SOS call but you didn't hear it. Those heavy loads that excessive work, sleeplessness, and stress put on your body might have stopped you completely at one point. Perhaps you accepted a chronic pain or exhaustion as 'normal' and tried to live but that tension on your shoulders never ended. You understand better now how much you neglected your health back then. You loaded much more than your body could carry and harrassed it a lot, honey.
saglik.simdi: Honey, right now your body is literally giving an alarm; the pain in your shoulders, the tension in your back, and your general exhaustion are all a result of those heavy wands you carry! You are in a period when spiritual loads turn into physical fatigue and if you don't stop, your body will stop you by force. This card says that you should urgently have a check-up right now or at least leave everything and rest for a few days. You can't solve all the problems of the world, you should first show compassion to your own body. Please put those wands aside and just breathe, your health is slipping away!
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a healing or physical renewal process that will challenge you a lot regarding health awaits you, honey. Perhaps you will enter a very heavy sports camp or start a difficult process to get rid of all the toxins in your body. You will feel very tired at the beginning of this process and want to give up but when you reach the goal, you will have a brand-new body. This burden you will undertake to protect your health in the future will actually be your biggest investment to prolong your life span. The end of the road is vitality and lightness, a bit more patience honey.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'tired warrior' image; you shouldered all the responsibility of life alone and carried it without letting anyone know. Those years spent among sacrifices in love, overworking in work, and financial burdens matured you very early. The fact that you didn't drop your wands even in those moments when no one helped is proof of how resilient you are. But this excessive loading back then has left a bit of bitterness and fatigue in your soul today. You shouldered all the burden of life in the past more than enough, honey.
hepsi.simdi: Darling, right now you are at a 'limit' point in every area of your life; literally the last drop that will overflow the glass is about to come! Responsibilities in your career, expectations in your love, and financial worries have all combined and collapsed on you like a giant rock. This card says you should say 'stop' right now and determine your priorities. Trying to handle everything at the same time and alone is finishing you, are you aware? Please leave some wands on the ground, say 'no' to some, and open a breathing space for yourself. You don't have to be a hero, you are just a soul seeking peace.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future shows that you are very close to your goal but the biggest fatigue will come right at that final point. Even though that last big effort you must give to reach your dreams will harrass you a bit, the result will be worth it. In love, in work, and in life in general, when you deliver those heavy wands to the goal, such a big burden will lift off you that you will be light as birds. You should be patient and never hesitate to ask for help in this final 'load carrying' phase in the future. When you reach the peak of that mountain, all the wands will bloom and you will enjoy the victory in peace.

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you were under such a heavy burden in love that you eventually couldn't carry it and dropped everything from your hands and experienced a ruin. The fact that all the efforts you gave to save your relationship went for nothing all of a sudden or your partner letting you down halfway left a deep wound in your soul. Perhaps you left everything for a period and withdrew your hands and feet completely from your love life. This 'collapse' feeling in those days still causes you to be afraid of taking responsibility today. You are a heart crushed under love in those days.
ask.simdi: Darling, right now you are experiencing a period of 'escape' or 'refusal of responsibility' in your love life; it's as if you don't want to take on any emotional burden. Problems in your relationship have accumulated like a mountain but you choose to ignore them and say 'whatever, let him do what he wants.' This card says that actually that big fatigue within you pushes you to indifference and insensitivity. If you don't share problems with your partner, all these wands might collapse on your heads one day. You should ask yourself why you have become so insensitive and why you left everything, honey.
ask.gelecek: In your future, in some situations you will experience in the name of love, you might miss big opportunities because you avoid taking responsibility. Responsibilities like a relationship becoming serious or marriage will scare you so much that you can end everything by saying 'no' at the very beginning. Moving with the logic 'no biri should be a burden to me' in the relationships that will start in this period might prevent you from establishing a real bond. However, this process reminds you that you first need to clear those old burdens within yourself. If you want to be free in the future, you must learn to stack the wands correctly instead of throwing them away.

is.gecmis: In your past, you experienced such a collapse in business life that all responsibilities suddenly poured down from your head and you didn't know what to do. Perhaps because you were overloaded in a project you made a mistake and lost your job or you left everything and went away due to burnout syndrome. Those moments when you said 'I can't do it' in your career must have leveled your self-confidence to the ground. This 'getting rid of the load' but sad getting rid of state back then causes you to avoid taking risks in business life today. You were literally paralyzed for a period under the weight of the business world, darling.
is.simdi: Darling, right now you are doing your best to escape responsibilities in business life; you are literally neglecting your work or shifting it onto others. Perhaps you got so tired that you no longer have the strength to even move a pen and this situation is starting to be noticed by your superiors. This card whispers that this current 'let-it-go' state could cause serious damage to your career. If you cannot handle this much load, resigning or changing your place might be a more honorable behavior. You should honestly evaluate why you couldn't carry these wands and why you left so easily.
is.gelecek: In your future, some glitches regarding your career plans and problems arising from not being able to fulfill responsibilities appear, honey. An important task will be given to you but you can give up at the very beginning saying 'I can't carry this load.' This situation is not because of your untalentedness, but just because you still haven't been able to throw that big fatigue coming from the past off you. If you want to rise in your career in the future, you will need to learn not to throw a part of the wands away, but how to carry them more efficiently. Otherwise, you will continue to stall in your place.

para.gecmis: In your past, you came under such a big burden in financial sense that you eventually came to the brink of bankruptcy or became unable to pay your debts. This failure in managing money or excessive spending might have left you literally stranded for a period. Those days when you tried to escape your financial responsibilities or ignored your debts follow you today. This financial 'disintegration' back then causes you to approach money always with a lack of trust and fear today. You broke your back while carrying financial wands in those days, honey.
para.simdi: Darling, right now your financial situation is literally in a chaos; instead of paying debts you are opening new debts or not cutting down on your spending at all. Trying to escape your financial responsibilities only drags you into a bigger deadlock, are you aware? This card says that you should urgently make a 'debt restructuring' right now and bring these scattered wands together. Instead of seeing money as a burden and ignoring it, you should put your hand under the stone and clarify your accounts. Otherwise, this financial weight will completely crush you, be aware.
para.gelecek: In your future, some losses you will experience in financial sense might grow even more because you avoid taking responsibility and don't act planned. You have a risk of panicking in a financial crisis and getting rid of everything or entering into wrong investments. If you avoid that disciplined struggle you must give to protect your money, you might become dependent on others in the future. In this process, it is a must to learn to be patient and clear your financial loads one by one. If you want to get rich in the future, you must empty those heavy loads in your wallet now.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a burnout regarding your health, even when your body said 'enough' you continued to force it and experienced a collapse. Perhaps you had to lie in a hospital for a period or fell completely into a spiritual void. Those days when you focused on carrying the loads of life instead of defending your own healing still leave weak points in your health today. This 'physical bankruptcy' state back then triggers the fear of 'will I collapse again?' even at the slightest fatigue today. You loaded much more than your body could carry, honey.
saglik.simdi: Honey, right now you are in a complete 'escape' and 'denial' state regarding your health; you ignore the pains in your body and act as if nothing is wrong. But deep down you are so tired and so exhausted that your soul is literally being crushed under the wands. This card cries out that you should urgently take a break right now and lighten your physical loads. If you don't pay attention to your nutrition, sleep, and stress management, it is inevitable for you to experience a physical collapse very soon. Please leave the wands on the ground and just focus on your own body, health is your biggest wealth!
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a process appears that will challenge you a lot regarding health but will get worse if you don't take responsibility, honey. As long as you see taking care of yourself as a 'burden', your healing will also be that much delayed and painful. The physical fatigues you will encounter in the future will be a result of those spiritual loads you have been carrying since the past. In the future, you might have to enter into a very heavy and restrictive physical/medical treatment program to regain your health. If you don't learn to lighten your loads now, your body will stop you one day by force.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'ruin' and 'staying under the burden' energy; life has challenged you beyond your capacity many times. You might have taken on so many responsibilities in love, work, and personal struggles that your nervous system eventually failed. Those days when you turned your own life into a wreck while trying to solve the problems of others follow you today. While you were trying to hold your wand upright against life, you literally fell flat on the ground under the weight of the wands, honey. This 'exhaustion' back then has made you more timid today.
hepsi.simdi: Darling, right now you are in a phase of 'chaos' and 'escaping responsibilities' in your general life; it's as if you can't cope with anything. Everyone expects something from you but you just want to run and hide or leave everything as it is. This card whispers that this current 'disorder' state drags you into a bigger failure. Why did you leave the wands so uncontrollably? You must pull yourself together immediately, determine your priorities, and take the ropes of your life back in your hands. You are not a victim, just a very tired hero.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, you have the risk of throwing in the towel and leaving everything in the face of the tests that await you in your general life. If you don't revitalize that sense of responsibility and order within you, life will crush you as it wishes. You might come under the hegemony of others in your career, love, and financial situation and lose your own freedom. However, this situation is your choice; stacking the wands correctly or staying under them is completely in your hands. If you want to find peace in the future, you should learn to manage your loads now, honey.

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you made a very exciting and childish start as if a fresh spring had come to your love life. You must remember a period that was flirtatious and energetic, where your heart beat with such a pure and curious curiosity for the first time. Perhaps a message from someone young-spirited or adventurous, who gave you a brand-new perspective, changed your entire world. This desire to explore you felt back then has been one of the sweetest memories that refreshes your faith in love. You discovered how fun and inspiring love could be in those days.
ask.simdi: Darling, a huge spark is igniting in your love life right now; a brand-new news or an unexpected flirtation is at your door! Your heart's doors are wide open and you are full of excitement as if you are about to embark on a new adventure at any moment. If you are single, a message you will receive from someone creative and energetic, who will be very good for you, can carry you above the clouds. This card represents the time when you are most open to learning, exploring, and taking risks emotionally. Release that curious child within you and go where this fresh energy of love drags you, you won't regret it.
ask.gelecek: In your future, there is a brand-new beginning in the name of love that will excite you a lot, adeta make you happy like a child! Such news will come your way that you will feel as if your heart is about to jump out and a fresh breath will come to your entire life. Perhaps that person you will meet in a travel or education environment will rekindle your passions and remind you how colorful life is. This relationship in the future will not only be an emotional bond, but also a connection that teaches you a lot and inspires you. Get ready honey, the most dynamic and explorative page of love is about to open.

is.gecmis: In your past, you opened the door of a brand-new opportunity in your career and followed the creative ideas that came to you in that period. Perhaps you started an education in a field you never knew or you jumped into a project like a 'page' with curiosity but you learned a lot in the end. This desire to learn and the courage brought by the amateur spirit in those days became the biggest architect of your vision today. Those first steps you took on the career path opened brand-new and wide horizons for you. You grasped very well back then that success is not just working hard, but also being curious, darling.
is.simdi: Honey, you are currently experiencing a complete 'new ideas' explosion in your business life; your brain is literally producing new projects like a clockwork! A news or a job offer you hold in your hand might be exciting you a lot and that entrepreneurial spirit within you is at its peak. This period is the perfect time to start a new job, enroll in a course, or realize a creative project. Without waiting for approval from anyone, you should walk by following only the light of that wand within you. Success is waiting for you, it's enough to take that first step with that fresh and dynamic energy.
is.gelecek: In your future, a very joyful news or a promotion news regarding your business life awaits you, honey. You will reach such a point in your career that you will shine not like a master, but like a fresh genius who learns something new every day. Perhaps a job connected with abroad or a travel opportunity will completely change your career path. That unquenchable curiosity within you will carry you to the most creative places on the success steps. Soon you will be mentioned as a complete 'source of inspiration' in business life, start getting excited for those days now!

para.gecmis: In your past, you made a small but very promising start financially and opened a fresh income gate. Perhaps thanks to an additional job or a creative idea, money entered your wallet from a different place for the first time and this encouraged you a lot. You understood back then that money can be earned not only with savings but also with smart and dynamic ideas. Those small but energetic steps you took in those days formed the foundation of your financial vision today. You caught the fresh scent of abundance back then, darling.
para.simdi: Honey, right now a new movement and financial news are circulating in your wallet; you are literally like a magnet attracting money! You might receive a good news about receiving the financial return of a creative idea or a new investment opportunity might come your way. This period is the time to use that fresh energy to turn small accumulations into big investments. You are in a time when you will discover new ways to accelerate the flow of money and feel much more free financially. Just trust your energy and don't forget to channel this fresh abundance in the right direction.
para.gelecek: In your future, there is news of a gain that will relieve you a lot financially and make you smile, starting from scratch but growing rapidly. A payment coming from an unexpected place or a very profitable, creative partnership offer could change your life. You will literally sow a seed financially and see this seed turn into an abundance tree quickly. Instead of financial worries, fresh ideas on how to use money in more exciting jobs will take place. Your future is full of very bright, abundant, and promising beginnings for your wallet, honey.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you experienced a new awakening regarding your health and acquired fresh habits that would heal your body, darling. Those days when you felt much more energetic and full of life reminded you what a great potential your body has. Perhaps you met a new sports branch or you changed your life with information you received from a nutritionist. This dynamism you gained in that period was the solidest foundation of your resilient state today. You received the reward of taking good care of your body and setting new goals for it more than enough in the past.
saglik.simdi: Honey, your body is literally bursting with energy right now; you feel very fit, fresh, and ready for every kind of adventure! If you are experiencing any weakness, this card gives you the good news that you will recover immediately and a fresh life force is filling your body. You are at the best time for a new diet program or a detox because your will is very strong right now. This joy of life within you reflects everywhere from your skin to your eyes and makes you look glowing. Feel the taste of this high frequency and vitality in every moment, honey.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a brand-new life energy cycle is starting that will keep you very fit regarding health. A period awaits you where you will feel energetic like a child and be cleansed of all your fatigues. Perhaps you will go to a yoga camp or meet a new discipline that will also heal you spiritually. Your body will get younger every passing day and your life energy will be high enough to inspire those around you. That fresh and fiery power you need for a healthy future will always be with you, believe in this.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'brand-new beginnings' and 'discoveries' energy; life has dragged you into many fresh paths. That first excitement in love, that first big inspiration in work, and that fresh power in health touched your life at the same time and revitalized you. In every matter where you took a risk, the universe made you modest as a page but brave as a hero in that period. This momentum you gained back then has been the biggest driving force that put your life on its current creative track. You literally rebuilt your fate in the past with fresh ideas and great curiosity, honey.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, right now a 'good news' and 'renewal' atmosphere prevails in every area of your life; literally everything is overflowing with a fresh excitement! Your heart is so open to a new love, your mind to new business projects, and your body to healing that let anyone who can stop you try. It's the perfect time to bring out that curious soul within you to evaluate these fresh opportunities life offers you. Everything started with a message or small steps and now those steps are about to turn into a giant torch that illuminates your entire world. Just believe and follow the light of that wand, honey.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future looks full of miraculous beginnings and great inspirations in every area of life! You will make literally a revolution in love, work, and personal development and build a brand-new 'you.' The fresh opportunities that will come your way will excite you so much that you will throw all the dust of the past aside and run toward the future with passion. In this new journey full of success, happiness, and health, the universe will be your biggest supporter and source of inspiration. Get ready honey, the most energetic, productive, and discovery-filled period of your life is starting for you very soon!

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, that flirtation or relationship that you started with very great enthusiasm unfortunately didn't turn out as you expected and ended in disappointment. Perhaps you met someone immature who lied to you, or that important news of love you expected never came. This 'misleading beginning' in that period somewhat damaged your pure faith in love and made you defensive. Those days when you felt your feelings were exploited make it difficult for you to open your heart to someone new today. Just as you were catching the fresh scent of love, your dreams faded in those days, honey.
ask.simdi: Honey, you might be experiencing a period of 'communication breakdown' or 'bad news' in your love life right now; it's as if everything is always being misunderstood. That message you expect doesn't come or you receive news from the person you love that disappoints you. Perhaps you are acting very childish and irresponsible right now, which might be putting your relationship in a deadlock. This card says you should not make hasty decisions right now and not believe every news heard immediately. Your excitement might have left its place to pessimism; time to stop and calm down a bit.
ask.gelecek: In your future, in some situations you will experience in the name of love, there is a risk of being misdirected by wrong people or being saddened by groundless news. That beginning you want so much might be postponed for a while longer due to the indecision or lies of the other party. The answer to the questions where you say 'I wonder?' in your relationships might not be as pink as you expect, so you should be cautious. However, this process will be a test given for you to be more selective and mature in love. If you want to establish a real bond in the future, you will need to learn not to think every parldayan is gold, honey.

is.gecmis: In your past, that project you entered with great hope in business or that job you applied for unfortunately resulted in failure due to lack of seriousness or inadequacy. Perhaps your ideas were very good but you couldn't provide that discipline during the implementation phase, or those who promised you let you down. That period, which resulted in disappointment while expecting an awakening in your career, might have pushed you into a standstill regarding creativity. It's as if you wasted the opportunities in your hand and used the wand wrongly. Those 'half-finished works' from that period make you a bit more discouraged today.
is.simdi: Honey, you might feel yourself in a 'focus problem' in business life right now; you have a thousand ideas but you can't bring any of them to a conclusion. Perhaps you are dealing with groundless gossip at work or that promotion news you expected reached you negatively. Your motivation is so low that even evaluating the small opportunities that come your way feels like a big burden to you. This card whispers that you should maintain your seriousness right now and not change your strategy by believing every news you hear. You are in a chaos right now, you need to simplify your mind first.
is.gelecek: In your future, some bad news regarding your career plans or annoying situations like the cancellation of projects appear, honey. If you are expecting an important job offer, you might learn that the conditions are much more difficult than you expected or that the offer has been withdrawn. While wanting to open a brand-new page in your career, you might encounter some obstacles or mistakes brought by inexperience. You shouldn't give up in this process but follow a more disciplined and realistic path. To catch that fresh energy leading to success again, you will need to be cleansed of childish mistakes.

para.gecmis: In your past, you received a financial blow when things went wrong at the last moment while expecting a big gain or by trusting a wrong news. Perhaps the lack of abundance of an investment tired you quite a bit back then and the places where you said 'I will earn money from this business' let you down. You were so sure that the money would come that when the result was a disappointment, your financial balances must have been shaken a bit. This financial disappointment in those days causes you to approach money always with a suspicion today. You seem to have taken the financial wand a bit too lightly back then, darling.
para.simdi: Honey, right now there is a 'leak of abundance' in your wallet; it's as if it's clear where the money will go even before it reaches your hand and this annoys you. You might be inclined to jump into groundless news or very karl-looking risky businesses in financial matters, please be careful! This period says the conditions are not suitable at all for making a financial start and the risk of being deceived is high. You are in a time frame where you need to act with your logic, not your emotions, to protect your money. You should master your expenses and protect your wallet from external influences.
para.gelecek: In your future, it appears that the big news of gain you expect regarding money will be a bit more delayed or not as big as you expected. Misinformation or a technical glitch regarding an investment or money transfer might annoy you. While expecting a financial relief, you have a risk of encountering extra expenses instead. The gate of wealth is not yet fully ajar, so you should progress cautiously and be very careful especially in the transactions you will make over the internet. To reach the energy of abundance, you must first take your financial responsibilities seriously.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you trivialized a health-related warning and caused a small problem to grow, darling. While your body was giving alarms, you continued to force yourself with that childish energy saying 'nothing will happen' and fell tired. Perhaps you started a treatment process but didn't take it seriously and left it halfway, so the healing process was very much delayed. This state of 'negligence' from that period triggers the fear of 'I wonder if it's something serious?' even at the slightest pain today. You silenced the voice of your body back then and didn't show it the necessary care.
saglik.simdi: Honey, you are currently in a complete 'energy chaos' regarding your health; sometimes you are very active and sometimes you are too exhausted to even move a finger. Your body is giving you some signals but you either misinterpret them or ignore them completely. This card says your immunity is weak right now and you are more vulnerable especially to contagious diseases or accidents. Please put childish stubbornness aside, take your health seriously, and listen to your physical needs. Healing will come only when you take yourself seriously.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, you have a risk of experiencing bsome annoying processes like wrong diagnoses or delays in treatment regarding health issues, honey. As long as you see taking care of yourself as a 'boring' task, it will be that much more difficult for you to reach full vitality. The physical fatigues you will encounter in the future will be a result of your current irregular lifestyle. If you don't follow a more serious and disciplined path to protect your health in the future, your body will stop you one day by force. You should increase your compassion and seriousness toward yourself and seek healing within yourself.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'indecision' and 'wasted energies' period; life has dragged you into many wrong paths. You will reach such a point on the career path that you will now act with a global vision, not just a local one. All your efforts will bear fruit in the most magnificent way and you will sit proudly in the victory seat. A responsibility you will soon take will turn you into a power monument both financially and spiritually. Get ready honey, it's very close for you to be a complete 'legend' in the business world.

para.gecmis: In your past, you acted literally like a 'financial genius' in a financial sense and laid the foundations of a great wealth, honey. You knew how to manage money, where to invest so well that you passed through a period when abundance never diminished. Those days when you built your financial freedom with your own hands and became a financial authority are the source of that trust in your wallet even today. You proved in the past in the most noble form that money is not just a piece of paper, but a tool of power. This consciousness of abundance back then has ingrained into your soul, honey.
para.simdi: Honey, right now you are in complete mastery and prosperity regarding your financial resources; you have literally become the master of money! You have magnificent strategic ideas to increase your income and you have that great power to realize all of them one by one. The abundance of your wallet increases day by day and you use your financial power not just for yourself, but also to protect your loved ones. This period is the time to collect the reward of your smart moves and enjoy your financial independence in its most luxurious form. The energy of abundance is revolving around your logical decisions, just enjoy this kingdom.
para.gelecek: In your future, a complete 'wealth explosion' and an unshakable economic power card is opening for you in financial terms. A wealth larger than you ever expected might come into your hands or an income gate/signature that will keep you like a king for a lifetime might open. Glorious days are at the door when financial worries will completely end and you will only focus on big investments. The universe has made all its preparations and is waiting to reward you with abundance because of this brave and visionary stance of yours. Your future is full of bright gold and you will live at the highest level of prosperity, honey.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you displayed such a resistance and fire of life regarding your health that everyone admired the healing power of your body. Those days when you felt very fit, energetic, and literally invincible taught you what a magnificent machine your body is. Perhaps you defeated a disease only with your will or successfully completed a difficult discipline that would take your body to the highest level. This royal resistance you gained in that period was the biggest architect of your solid and authoritative stance today. You received the reward of looking at your body like an empire more than enough in the past, darling.
saglik.simdi: Honey, right now your health energy is working at full capacity and discipline; you feel literally as strong and fit as a lion! That magnificent harmony between your body and your mind gives you a magnificent charisma and physical resistance. You feel more balanced than ever and you only make logical and healthy choices while keeping up with the rhythm of life. This card heralds that you have completely defeated a health problem if you had one or your general well-being has peaked. Your light and fire of life are noticed even from the outside, you are literally shining with health and that asalet worthy of queens, honey.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, the health picture waiting for you promises a perfect vitality and a long, energetic life, honey. You are entering a very peaceful period where you provide complete mastery over your body and every cell is renewed with honesty and health. Even in old age, you will have a genius and vitality that will stone those around you and you will be an example to everyone with your health. A taptaze and powerful you is being born in the future where every kind of physical and spiritual disorder will end. The years ahead will pass with health, peace, and that noble, rational energy, believe in this.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'leader' and 'conqueror' energy; in a period of your life, you literally brought the whole world to its knees with your intelligence. You lived that honest bond in love, that magnificent success in work, and that unshakable discipline in health at the same time and became literally one with the universe. Those days when everyone respected you and benefited from those honest decisions of yours are the strongest part of your character even today. You proved to the whole world back then how to stand honest and wise in every area of life, honey. Success was engraved in your soul back then like a royal seal.
hepsi.simdi: Honey, right now you are experiencing a period of 'authority' and 'transparency' in every area of your life; everything is progressing exactly as you want and manage! You are in a magnificent balance where you enjoy honesty in love, establishing authority in work, and financial prosperity at the same time. Your self-confidence is so high that every step you take arouses admiration and a bit of respectful hesitation around you. This card says that it is a 'strategy victory' time for you and you should maintain all the victories you have won with honesty. Life greets you honey, you are a wise leader who manages the world with his intelligence right now.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future promises a magnificent empire where you will reach the very top in every area of life and say 'I won with my intelligence.' While you rise to the highest office you can reach in your career, you will also live that great happiness honestly with your soulmate like a king and queen. A period when no financial deficiency remains and your health shines brightly will rule your life very soon. That moment when all your dreams merge and turn into a single big honesty will be the biggest victory of your life. The universe has made all its preparations and is waiting to reward you, be ready for this magnificent future!

ask.gecmis: Honey, in your past, you completely suppressed your emotions while trying to be too logical in your love life and therefore you lived a very cold, distant relationship and were eventually disappointed. Perhaps your partner was very manipulative and someone who beat you with his words or you defended your own truths so harshly that you broke the heart of the person across from you. This 'emotional drought' and 'destructive honesty' state back then causes you to exhibit a more prejudiced and harsh stance toward love even today. While you were trying to protect your own mind in love, you lost love for a period, honey.
ask.simdi: Honey, right now you might be experiencing a 'communication accident' and 'manipulation' period in your love life; it's as if you want everything to be your way. You might be acting very harsh, critical, and even sarcastic toward your partner, which breaks that beautiful bond between you more and more every day. If you are single, you exhibit such an unapproachable and arrogant attitude that the hearts of those who want to approach you turn back from the door. This card whispers that you are using your intelligence right now not to love, but to come out right. You should soften up a bit and see love not as a logic test, but as a heart sharing, honey.
ask.gelecek: In your future, in some situations you will experience in the name of love, you have the risk of experiencing big breakups because of your extreme harshness or resorting to lies. That 'intelligent' looking person you will encounter might be a tiran who sours you mentally and turns everything to his own advantage. Your moving away completely from empathy by saying 'I know the best' in your relationships might drag you again into the same ice-cold loneliness in the future. However, this process will be a lesson given for you to learn to see not only with your mind but also with your soul in love. If you want to find peace in the future, you will need to learn to use that sword not as a weapon, but as a torch.

is.gecmis: In your past, you entered such an authority fight in business life that because of your ambition and arrogance you missed a big opportunity or encountered a legal obstacle, honey. Perhaps you were very talented but your reputation was shaken a bit because you looked down on people or resorted to unfair ways. Those wrong steps you took with the ambition of 'I am the only one who knows' in your career must have pushed you into a big deadlock professionally for a period. Those 'despotic' and 'unjust' attitudes in those days cause you to act always with a fear of 'being caught' or 'making a mistake' in business life today. You used your intelligence in the wrong place and at the wrong time to crush people in the business world, honey.
is.simdi: Honey, right now you are experiencing a complete 'power poisoning' or on the contrary, a magnificent anger because you were treated unfairly; you are in constant conflict with those around you. Trying to control everything at work but breaking people makes you a very tense and unbearable state. This card says that this current 'harsh and manipulative' attitude of yours could cause serious damage to your career and open big legal problems. Please step back a bit, respect the ideas of others and don't turn into a dictator while trying to lead. Where you should stop right now is to put that sword in its scabbard and try to be a bit tolerant.
is.gelecek: In your future, some harsh obstacles regarding your career plans, legal cases, and big conflicts you will experience with authority figures appear. Because of your ambition for an important project or position, you might compromise on honesty and level everything to the ground at once. You have a risk of winning the hatred of those around you by using your charisma and intelligence wrongly in business life, and this might leave you very alone in the future. If you want to reach success, you will need to learn not to beat people with your intelligence, but to guide them. Otherwise, that career kingdom you dream of will never be yours, be aware.

para.gecmis: In your past, you might have taken a very risky and legal-limit-pushing decision in financial sense and taken a big financial blow by succumbing to your arrogance, honey. Those uncalculated spendings or wrong investments you made saying 'I know every law, every way' brought you to the brink of legal crises for a period. Those days when you used money as a show of power and crushed people financially might be following you today. This 'financial show-off' curiosity in that period causes you to approach money always with a fear of 'it will never be enough' and 'will I lose again?' today. You spent money for your ego, not for your financial freedom, in those days, honey.
para.simdi: Honey, right now a 'disorder' and 'excessive control' obsession prevails in your wallet; you act as if money is a tool that exists to satisfy your ego. Trying to show your financial situation much better than it is or trying to obtain gain by using legal gaps might be dragging you into a big disaster. This card whispers that instead of protecting your financial resources, you are burning them like a fire of ambition. You should urgently make a budget plan and understand that money is a temporary power and real power is in honesty. Time has come to cut those 'manipulative' spendings in your wallet right now, otherwise everything will be consumed.
para.gelecek: In your future, some losses you will experience in financial sense might grow even more because of your arrogance, legal mistakes, and wrong investment decisions. Not listening to the honest advice of others in a financial crisis and insisting by saying 'my word is right' could lead you to a big bankruptcy. If you avoid that modest struggle you must give to protect your money, you might lose all your financial power and respect in the future. In this process, it is a must to learn to be patient and use your ethical values, not your ambition, while managing money. If you want to get rich in the future, you should get rid of those royal fantasies in your wallet now.

saglik.gecmis: In your past, you ignored a warning regarding your health by saying 'I am very smart, it will pass' or by completely ignoring your emotions and harrassed your body a lot, honey. Those heavy loads that excessive stress, mental fatigue, and not taking time for yourself brought stopped you completely at one point. Perhaps you dealt with nervous system or head pains for a period because your mind couldn't handle that high fiery tempo and arrogance. You understand better now how much you neglected your health back then and how you acted like a tiran to your body. You silenced the voice of your body in those times not like a wise person, but like a cruel person, honey.
saglik.simdi: Honey, right now your body is literally in 'mental poisoning' and 'excessive tension'; your unquenchable ambition and arrogance are burning and destroying every cell! You are forcing yourself so much under the mask of honesty that your brain has reached the point of giving an error now. This card cries out that you should urgently take a break right now, meditate, or at least shut up for a bit. You cannot manage the whole world, you should first take that sharp sword in your mind under control. Please put aside those arrogant and hurtful thoughts; otherwise you have a risk of experiencing a serious health problem very soon, honey.
saglik.gelecek: In your future, a process appears that will challenge you quite a bit regarding health and where you will deal especially with diseases caused by mental fatigue. As long as you see taking care of yourself as a 'weakness', your healing will also be that much delayed and painful. The physical fatigues you will encounter in the future and especially head/neck-related problems will be a result of your current obsession with control. In the future, you might have to enter into a very radical and perhaps painful lifestyle change program to regain your health. If you don't learn to silence that angry and arrogant king within you now, your body will stop you one day by force.

hepsi.gecmis: When I look at your past, I see a general 'ego victim' and 'wrong use of intelligence' energy; life has tested you many times with your arrogance. Acting selfishly in love, breaking people at work, and saying 'nothing happens to me' in health might have dragged you into some deep regrets today. Those days when you lost your inner peace and honesty while trying to manage the lives of others have left a deep void in your soul. You shook your wand against life not like a king, but like a despot, and this left you alone, honey. This 'wrong power' use back then still makes you restless today.
hepsi.simdi: Darling, right now you are in a phase of 'obsession with control' and 'intolerance' in your general life; you act as if everyone is your servant. But deep down you are so alone and so tense that your soul is literally melting under the burning fire of your mind. This card whispers that this current 'harsh and oppressive' state of yours drags you to the edge of the abyss. Why did you become so aggressive and why are you pushing everyone away from you? You must pull yourself together immediately, learn to be modest, and take the ropes of your life not with anger, but with love. You can be a king but remember that real kings rule with mercy, not honesty.
hepsi.gelecek: In your future, you have the risk of acting excessively stubborn and harsh in the face of the tests that await you in your general life, honey. If you don't revitalize that tolerance and compassion within you, life will crush you as it wishes and leave you alone. You might experience big losses in your career, love, and financial situation because of your ambition and you can destroy the reputation you built with your own hands again with your own hands. However, this situation is your choice; whether to use your intelligence as a light or as a sword is completely in your hands. If you want to find peace in the future, you should be cleansed of your arrogance now.
